橿字的基本解释

橿
jiāng
古书上说的一种树，木材坚韧，可做车轮：“其木则柽松楔稷，槾柏杻橿。”
锄柄，锄把。

橿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāng］
［《廣韻》居良切，平陽，見。］
(1)木名。质地坚韧，古时用作车材。
(2)锄柄。

橿字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橿； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页555第36
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?居良切，音薑。【說文】枋也。一曰鋤柄。【釋名】齊人謂鋤柄曰橿。橿然，正直也。　又【唐韻】一名檍，萬年木。【爾雅·釋木】杻檍。【註】材中車輞。關西呼杻子。一名土橿。【周禮·冬官考工記】斬三材。【註】轂用雜楡，輻以檀，牙以橿。　又【爾雅·釋木】棧木。【註】橿木也。江東呼木觡。　又橿橿，彊盛也。【揚子·太?經】左右橿橿。　又山名。【山海經】橿谷之山，多赤銅。

考證：〔【逸雅】齊人謂鋤柄曰橿。〕　謹照原書逸雅改釋名。
橿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
橿字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，木材坚韧。也指锄柄，锄把。

橿
Basic explanation of words
橿
jiāng
The ancient book said that the wood is tough and can be used as a wheel: "The wood is a pine wedge, and a cypress."
Hoe handle, hoe handle.
橿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāng］
["Guangyun" Juliangqie, Pingyang, see you. ]
(1) Wooden name. It has a tough texture and was used as a car material in ancient times.
(2) Hoe handle.
橿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橿; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 555 36
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Ju Liangqie, sound ginger. [Said the text] Fang Ye. One said hoe handle. [Release name] The people of Qi said that hoe handle said 橿. Sure, integrity.　[Tang Yun] Another one, Wannianmu. 【Erya·Shimu】Tiaoyu. 【Note】Car rim in the material. Kansai Hutoko. A soil. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] cut three talents. [Note] The hub is mixed, the spoke is sandal, and the tooth is moist.　[Erya·Shimu] Zhanmu. [Note] Kashiki also. Jiangdong Humu Li.　 It’s also strong and prosperous. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】Left and right.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Shan Hai Jing】The mountains of Kashi Valley are rich in red copper. Textual research: [[Yiya] Qi people said that hoe handle said 橿. 〕　I would like to change the name according to the original book Yiya.

橿
Name meaning
A tree mentioned in ancient books, wood is tough. Also refers to hoe handle, hoe handle.
jiāng
сущ.
1) бот. дуб сизый (Quercus glauca Thunb.)
2) рукоять (напр. мотыги)
